sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // later on api will be called const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews?.length})) } {address}
{city} ${price}Per Person {city}
) } export default TourDetails
